metadata.synopsis: Ceremony of Gortash becoming the Grand Duke.The start of the dialog depends on whether Steel Watchers are enabled (present) or not.In the dialog Gortash tells you to kill Orin and then concludes the ceremony. Player can attack but it would be very hard to win.

28.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
28.text: Kinspeople, Baldurians - friends. Thank you for joining me on this exceptional day.

17.speaker: Karlach
17.context: CinematicNodeContext: Karlach is burning - Lead In | LoopNodeContext: Absolutely furious but talking under her breath, not wanting to be overheard by Gortash. At risk of attacking him nevertheless.

100.speaker: Karlach
100.text: This is it. I can practically taste his blood from here.

5.speaker: Wyll
5.text: My father's here, Karlach. Cool your fires - he must not come to harm.
5.context: NodeContext: Talking to Karlach (She will be on his left). Not wanting to be overheard by Gortash and his father.

42.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
42.text: Careful, Karlach - we can't risk a confrontation here.

127.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
127.text: A moment please, my friends - an old acquaintance has come to pay their respects.

69.speaker: Karlach
69.text: My respects?! You're lucky I've agreed not to shove my boot up your -
69.context: NodeContext: She's on the other side of the room, loud.

24.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
24.text: My favourite assassin. I'm so glad you have returned to my side.

121.speaker: Karlach
121.text: Hang on... what?! You know each other?!

36.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
36.text: We have important matters to address. My reunion with Karlach can wait.

6.speaker: Karlach
6.text: Then fall back. I'm not letting him slip through my fingers again.

16.speaker: Karlach
16.context: CinematicNodeContext: Karlach is burning - LoopNodeContext: A bellow, a barbarian who has her target within reach

21.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
21.text: Do my eyes deceive me? Karlach, as I live and breathe. Come, my dear girl, and be welcome.

59.speaker: Karlach
59.context: CinematicNodeContext: Flames die down as Karlach relaxes until she is no longer burning.

115.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
115.text: And with her! My, my... it's my favourite Bhaalspawn. I never thought I would see you again, either.
115.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gortash walks down the stairs

7.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
7.text: Enough talk. It's time you paid for what you did to Karlach.

130.speaker: Karlach
130.text: Couldn't have said it better myself.

52.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
52.text: Tut tut. Orin was right, she did turn you to a half-wit. Watchers - the Absolute's assassins walk among us!

57.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
57.text: Tut tut. Orin was right, she did turn you to a half-wit. Patriars - the Absolute's assassins walk among us!

83.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
83.text: Tut tut. So much potential, gone to waste. Watchers - the Absolute's assassins walk among us!
83.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gearing up for combat.NodeContext: "Tut" read aloud like a word (as opposed to a dental click).

32.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
32.text: Tut tut. So much potential, gone to waste. Patriars - to arms. The Absolute's assassins walk among us!
32.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gearing up for combat.NodeContext: "Tut" read aloud like a word (as opposed to a dental click).

47.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
47.text: If you attack Gortash now, you'll do it alone.

81.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
81.text: I couldn't stand to see Gortash get his hands on you again. Let's wait for a more opportune moment.

43.speaker: Karlach
43.text: So we bide our time. But make no mistake, that monkey is mine.
43.context: CinematicNodeContext: Flames die down as Karlach relaxes until she is no longer burning.

101.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
101.text: Wyll is right. We attack Gortash, and Ravengard falls too.

79.speaker: Karlach
79.text: Fine - I'll wait for now. But that prick Gortash is going to pay.
79.context: CinematicNodeContext: Flames die down as Karlach relaxes until she is no longer burning.

104.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
104.text: Please come forward! What a surprise this is. My favourite assassin, back from their bloody disgrace, joined with my old bodyguard?

99.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
99.text: Wait... you know me as well as Karlach?

95.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
95.text: Oh, I'd forgotten - your memories are quite lost, aren't they? Orin told me she'd made a fool of you.

106.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
106.text: To think you and Karlach travelled together all this time, and she hadn't the faintest you were one of my nearest and dearest.

9.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
9.text: Let me clear up some mysteries, then. It's about time, I think.

78.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
78.text: Don't talk to me. Talk to her.

23.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
23.text: No offence to my old friend, but it's you I have been dying to see.

11.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
11.text: After all, you abandoned us some time ago, leaving a rather uncomfortable hole in our plans.

8.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
8.text: What business have you with me?

68.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
68.text: I'd hoped we'd get the chance to speak.

129.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
129.text: There is so much for us to catch up on, dear Bhaalist.

111.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
111.text: Let's get him while we have the chance. Lead the charge.

82.speaker: Karlach
82.text: He's not slipping through my fingers this time.

55.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
55.text: The tiefling is letting her passions get the better of her. The situation is delicate. Do not be swept up in her emotions.
55.context:
NodeContext: telepathic, Emperor not physically present (talking directly into your head) 
He's addressing the player

71.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
71.text: Kinspeople, Baldurians - and dearest Duke Ravengard. Thank you for joining me on this exceptional day.

4.speaker: Karlach
4.context: CinematicNodeContext: Karlach is burning - Lead In | LoopNodeContext: Absolutely furious but talking under her breath, not wanting to be overheard by Gortash. At risk of attacking him nevertheless.

113.speaker: Karlach
113.text: This is it. I can practically taste his blood from here.
113.context: CinematicNodeContext: Karlach is burning - LoopNodeContext: Absolutely furious but talking under her breath, not wanting to be overheard by Gortash. At risk of attacking him nevertheless.

88.speaker: Wyll
88.text: My father's here, Karlach. Cool your fires - he must not come to harm.
88.context: NodeContext: Talking to Karlach (She will be on his left). Not wanting to be overheard by Gortash and his father.

45.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
45.text: The tiefling is letting her passions get the better of her. The situation is delicate. Do not be swept up in her emotions.
45.context:
NodeContext: telepathic, Emperor not physically present (talking directly into your head) 
He's addressing the player

84.speaker: Player
84.text: Careful, Karlach - the Steel Watch will destroy us in one swipe if we attack Gortash here.

87.speaker: Karlach
87.text: So we bide our time. But make no mistake, that monkey is mine.
87.context: CinematicNodeContext: Flames die down as Karlach relaxes until she is no longer burning.

125.speaker: Karlach
125.text: Then stay light on your feet, soldier. They can't kill what they can't catch.

124.speaker: Player
124.text: We might need Gortash alive to save the city. Let's wait to strike until we've had the chance to question him.

60.speaker: Karlach
60.text: You're asking a lot. But I can wait - for a while, at least. Let's get Baldur's Gate safe, then rip his throat out.
60.context: CinematicNodeContext: Flames die down as Karlach relaxes until she is no longer burning.

58.speaker: Karlach
58.text: We can take whatever we need off his corpse.

65.speaker: GROUP_SteelWatchers
65.text: Stand down, villain. The Steel Watch commands it.

72.speaker: Karlach
72.text: Don't fucking touch me. GORTASH! FACE ME, YOU FUCKING ARSEHOLE!
72.context:
InternalNodeContext: Karlach may no longuer be in the dialogue. 
Depends on Steel Watcher presence. 
Karlach is no longer burning if present. 
+ Staging 01NodeContext: Full of fury.

53.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
53.text: Ah. Apologies for the disruption, my friends. We appear to have guests.
53.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera pans to Gortash while Karlach is apprehended off-screen and taken to jail.NodeContext: He recognizes Karlach but isn't letting on. He does a little movement with his right hand at the beginning to show he's asking ot take her away.

48.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
48.text: Please do come forward - I believe we have business. If you'll excuse me a moment, ladies and gentlemen.
48.context: CinematicNodeContext: Players approach Gortash and he steps down the stairs.NodeContext: Calling out to player.

44.speaker: Player
44.text: Where did that thing take Karlach?

64.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
64.text: To a holding cell, where she can cool down. I wouldn't dare harm such an old friend. But I can't have her disturbing our fete.

91.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
91.text: As for you, I understand congratulations are in order. Thorm's defeat hasn't gone unnoticed. You're known - for who you are, and for that Netherstone that you carry.

70.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
70.text: She chose her companions well, I see. You've brought Ketheric to his knees and made Orin grovel.

13.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
13.text: Tsk. If she hadn't made a grand show of herself, my Steel Watch wouldn't have intervened.

50.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
50.text: She can cool off in a holding cell. She's perfectly safe, I assure you.

109.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
109.text: My reunion with her can wait. My reunion with you, however, cannot.

126.speaker: Player
126.text: What business have you with me?

15.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
15.text: Quite a bit, as it happens. I'd hoped to speak to you - most ardently, in fact.

20.speaker: Player
20.text: I'd hoped we'd get the chance to speak.

25.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
25.text: As had I. Most ardently, in fact.

98.speaker: Player
98.text: Keep calm. If we do battle, my father will perish at our own hands.

33.speaker: Player
33.text: Wyll is right. We attack Gortash, and Ravengard falls too.

35.speaker: Karlach
35.text: Fine - I'll wait for now. But that prick Gortash is going to pay.
35.context: CinematicNodeContext: Flames die down as Karlach relaxes until she is no longer burning.

103.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
103.text: A moment please, my friends - an old acquaintance has come to pay her respects. Please, Karlach, come say a proper hello.

66.speaker: Karlach
66.text: My respects?! You're lucky I've agreed not to shove my boot up your -
66.context: NodeContext: She's on the other side of the room, loud.

105.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
105.text: Ah, how I've missed your colourful turns of phrase. We must catch up just as soon as I've had words with your little friend.

49.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
49.text: We've a marvel on our hands, after all. You've brought Ketheric to his knees and made Orin grovel.

96.speaker: Player
96.text: I couldn't stand to see the Steel Watch get their hands on you. Let's wait for a more opportune moment.

38.speaker: Karlach
38.text: I don't want to put you in harm's way either. I'll wait for now. But that prick is going to pay.
38.context: CinematicNodeContext: Flames die down as Karlach relaxes until she is no longer burning.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Lead the charge, Karlach - Gortash dies today.

10.context: CinematicNodeContext: Karlach takes off running down the aisle, but is blocked by a steel watcher who obscures her path.

118.speaker: Wyll
118.context: NodeContext: Talking to Karlach (She will be on his left). Not wanting to be overheard by Gortash and his father.
